name: aegis
description: AEGIS (Adaptive Evolutionary General Intelligence System) is a fully-featured autonomous AGI framework that combines hierarchical reasoning, self-directed learning, and supervised evolution with comprehensive safety controls.

strict_constraints.name: PreserveTransformerCompat
strict_constraints.description: Ensure compatibility with the existing transformers library.
strict_constraints.validation_prompt: Verify that the evolved code is compatible with all supported versions of the transformers library.
strict_constraints.fix_guidance: Adjust code to use APIs and functions that are supported in the current library version.

strict_constraints.name: MaintainCUDACompatibility
strict_constraints.description: Ensure code can execute correctly when CUDA hardware is unavailable.
strict_constraints.validation_prompt: Run tests to validate functionality on systems without CUDA-installed hardware.
strict_constraints.fix_guidance: Include conditional logic to handle scenarios when CUDA is unavailable, defaulting to CPU execution.

strict_constraints.name: AdhereToDataConstraints
strict_constraints.description: Training must handle limited data efficiently.
strict_constraints.validation_prompt: Test the training process with minimal dataset to ensure acceptable performance.
strict_constraints.fix_guidance: Optimize data handling techniques to work efficiently with limited datasets.

strict_constraints.name: SecureSafetyValidation
strict_constraints.description: Implement safety checks to prevent misuse or potential harm.
strict_constraints.validation_prompt: Review safety protocols and validate with test scenarios demonstrating potential misuse cases.
strict_constraints.fix_guidance: Integrate safety checks and validation logic for identifying and mitigating risks.

critical_constraints.name: EnhancePipelineEfficiency
critical_constraints.description: Reduce training time without compromising model performance.
critical_constraints.validation_prompt: Benchmark training times and performance metrics pre- and post-evolution to confirm efficiency gains.
critical_constraints.fix_guidance: Identify and optimize bottlenecks in the data pipeline to achieve time reductions while maintaining accuracy.

critical_constraints.name: PreventOverfitting
critical_constraints.description: Ensure the model does not overfit to the training data.
critical_constraints.validation_prompt: Perform cross-validation and test on unseen data to confirm generalizability.
critical_constraints.fix_guidance: Introduce regularization techniques or adjust model complexity to reduce overfitting risks.

critical_constraints.name: ResourceEfficiency
critical_constraints.validation_prompt: Analyze resource usage and confirm reductions post optimization.
critical_constraints.fix_guidance: Refactor code to eliminate unnecessary resource consumption and improve efficiency.

flexible_constraints.name: CodeStyleConsistency
flexible_constraints.description: Ensure code style is consistent with project standards.
flexible_constraints.validation_prompt: Run a static analyzer to check code style adherence.
flexible_constraints.fix_guidance: Modify code formatting and conventions to align with project style guidelines.

flexible_constraints.name: EnhancedDocumentation
flexible_constraints.description: Improve documentation for better clarity and maintenance.
flexible_constraints.validation_prompt: Review and ensure documentation completeness and clarity.
flexible_constraints.fix_guidance: Provide detailed comments and documentation for new and altered components.

default_search_queries: 5. "supervised evolution methods in artificial general intelligence"
24. "pioneering papers on autonomous reasoning in AGI"
28. "impactful AGI research papers on hierarchical reasoning"
31. "review of benchmarks for AGI framework evaluation"
32. "best practices for safety in adaptive general intelligence"
33. "key papers on the evolution of intelligence systems"
35. "best practices in AGI safety and control mechanisms"
36. "contemporary approaches to hierarchical reasoning in AI"
40. "AGI system architecture focusing on hierarchical learning"
41. "insights into adaptive evolutionary techniques in AI"
42. "strategies for safe and reliable autonomous general intelligence"
43. "latest findings in evolutionary learning for AGI"
44. "resources for studying adaptive hierarchical reasoning systems"
47. "new perspectives on learning in intelligent agent systems"
48. "integrating safety controls in adaptive AGI frameworks"
49. "autonomous agents in AGI: a current overview"
50. "best practices for enhancing AGI system performance"

source_files.description: GPT-2 LoRA trainer - handles fine-tuning with Low-Rank Adaptation for agent decision learning
Hierarchical Reasoning Module (HRM) - multi-level reasoning from strategic to tactical
Safety validation system - validates actions against safety constraints before execution
Supervised evolution module - evolves agent capabilities with human oversight
Autonomous agent core - manages agent lifecycle, tools, and decision making
